titleStmt.title: The magistrates commission from heaven. Declared in a sermon preached in Laurencejury, London, the 28. day of Sept. 1644. at the election of the Lord Major. / By Anthony Burgesse, sometimes fellow of Immanuel Colledge in Cambridge; now pastour of Sutton Coldfield in Warwick shire, and a member of the Assembly. Imprimatur Thomas Gataker.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

titleStmt.title: The magistrates commission from heaven. Declared in a sermon preached in Laurencejury, London, the 28. day of Sept. 1644. at the election of the Lord Major. / By Anthony Burgesse, sometimes fellow of Immanuel Colledge in Cambridge; now pastour of Sutton Coldfield in Warwick shire, and a member of the Assembly. Imprimatur Thomas Gataker.
titleStmt.author: Burgess, Anthony, d. 1664.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by George Miller for Thomas Vnderhill at the Bible in Woodstreet,

notesStmt.note: Variant: lacks the words "in Cambridge" in title.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
